themes: lack of paid opportunities for performance artists
economic hardship and cost of living pressures
inaccessibility of venues and performance spaces
inequity in support across different types of artists
key_phrases: distinctive lack of venues willing to work with performance artists
wages stagnate, costs of living skyrocket
audience members become increasingly cautious to buy tickets
not accessible for artists without sponsors or a personal savings
struggle with basic needs like health insurance, food, rent
all energy is spent trying to survive
barriers_identified: lack of venues willing to provide budgets for performers
decreased audience willingness to purchase tickets
requirement for personal savings or sponsorship to access opportunities
lack of access to basic needs (health insurance, food, rent)
